id.description: The unique identifier of the driver.

name.description: The name of the driver, typically used for display purposes.

firstName.description: The given name or first name of the driver.

lastName.description: The family name or last name of the driver.

fullName.description: The full name of the driver, usually a combination of first, middle and last names.

abbreviation.description: The three-letter abbreviation for the driver, consisting of uppercase letters (e.g., 'SEN' for Ayrton Senna).

permanentNumber.description: The permanent racing number chosen by the driver.

dateOfBirth.description: The birth date of the driver.

dateOfDeath.description: The death date of the driver, if applicable.

placeOfBirth.description: The place of birth of the driver.

countryOfBirthCountryId.description: The identifier of the country where the driver was born.

nationalityCountryId.description: The identifier of the nationality of the driver.

secondNationalityCountryId.description: The identifier of the second nationality of the driver, if applicable.

bestChampionshipPosition.description: The best finishing position achieved by the driver in a World Driver Championship.

bestStartingGridPosition.description: The best starting grid position achieved by the driver in a race.

bestRaceResult.description: The best finishing position achieved by the driver in a race.

totalChampionshipWins.description: The total number of World Driver Championships won by the driver.

totalRaceEntries.description: The total number of races entered by the driver.

totalRaceStarts.description: The total number of races started by the driver.

totalRaceWins.description: The total number of races won by the driver.

totalRaceLaps.description: The total number of laps completed by the driver.

totalPodiums.description: The total number of podium finishes achieved by the driver.

totalPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the driver.

totalChampionshipPoints.description: The total number of points accumulated by the driver in World Driver Championships.

totalPolePositions.description: The total number of pole positions achieved by the driver.

totalFastestLaps.description: The total number of fastest laps set by the driver.

totalDriverOfTheDay.description: The total number of Driver of the Day awards received by the driver.

totalGrandSlams.description: The total number of Grand Slams achieved by the driver, defined as pole position, fastest lap, and leading every lap of the race.
